瓺字的基本解释

瓺
cháng
一种腹大口小的瓦器。

瓺字的汉语字典释义

[①]［cháng］
［《廣韻》直良切，平陽，澄。］
(1)陶制容器。
(2)同“丈”。

瓺字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【瓦字部】　瓺； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页749第23
【廣韻】直良切【集韻】仲良切，?音長。【博雅】瓺，甁也。【揚子·方言】罃，燕之東北，朝鮮洌水之閒，謂之瓺。　又【集韻】直亮切，音仗。又丑亮切，音悵。義?同。

瓺字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
瓺字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Hu
cháng
A pottery with a big belly and a small mouth.

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［cháng］
["Guangyun" Zhiliang cut, Pingyang, Cheng. ]
(1) Earthenware container.
(2) Same as "Zhang".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Wu Ji 1] [Wa Zi Department] 　瓺; Kangxi strokes: 12; Page number: page 749 23
[Guang Yun] Nao Liang cut [Ji Yun] Zhong Liang cut, long sound. [Bo Ya] 瓺, 甁也. 【Yangtze Dialect】Feng, the northeast of Yan, the leisure of North Korea’s water is called Zhihu.　[Jiyun] Straight and bright cut, sound battle. It's ugly and bright, and the sound is melancholy. Righteous? Same.
